import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' const CalendarDaysForm = ({ prevYear, prevMonth, getMonth, getYear, nextMonth, }) => { return ( <> {/* Month selector */}
« ᐊ {/* {this.getMonthName(this.state.month)} */} {getMonth} {/* {" " + this.state.year} */} {" " + getYear} onClick={nextMonth}> ᐅ »
{/* Days grid */}
{dayNames}
{days}
) } CalendarDaysForm.propTypes = {} export default CalendarDaysForm
